Reference

All functions

CpG_anno450K

Illumina Infinium HumanMethylation450 manifest file

CpG_genes

Genes associated with Illumina 450K CpG sites

CpG_in_CGI()

CpGs within a CpG island

N_ranges

Unsequences genome

UCSC_CGI

Data frame with all UCSC islands in rows and columns: CpG_island_name, chr, start, end, length, strand and UCSC_CpG_island_name. The last column matches the CGI names used in Infinium HumanMethylation450 description file. UCSC CpG islands

boxed_heatmap()

Heat map without the use of `layout` function

coord_sort()

Sorting CpGs by coordinate

cor_permutationTest()

Correlation permutation test

cor_resamplingStats()

Mean and standard deviation of correlation

find_CpG()

CpG coordinates on a chromosome

max_normalization()

Maximum normalization

meMultiplex()

Multiplex: `meNet` file from two `igraph` layers

meMultiplex_communities()

Multiplex community structure

meMultiplex_to_multinet()

Multiplex: `meNet` file to `multinet` object

meNet_CGI()

CpG network: edges are based on CpG island affiliation

meNet_cor()

CpG network: edges based on correlation

meNet_gene()

CpG network: edges are based on gene affiliation

meNet_singleCGI()

CpG network for a single CpG island

meNet_singleGene()

CpG network for a single gene

neg_max_normalization()

Negative maximum normalization

plot_multiplex()

Multiplex plot

read_infomap_communities()

Multiplex community structure from file
